borrowing.title: Borrowing
borrowing.description: How to request and use items from other members

lending.title: Lending
lending.description: Sharing your items with the community

howToBorrow.question: How can I borrow an item?
howToBorrow.answer: To borrow an item, search for the item you need, click 'Request to Borrow' and wait for the owner's approval. Once approved, you can coordinate pickup.

howToLend.question: How can I lend my items?
howToLend.answer: You can add items by clicking 'Add Item' in your dashboard. Add photos, description, and details. Members will be able to request to borrow your items.

safety.question: Is it safe to lend my items?
safety.answer: All members are verified and we have a rating system. We also recommend meeting borrowers in person and setting clear expectations.

pricing.question: How much does it cost to use the platform?
pricing.answer: The platform is free to use. We don't charge for lending or borrowing items. Voluntary donations help keep the service running.

disputes.question: What if there's a problem with a loan?
disputes.answer: If there are any issues, contact our support team. We mediate disputes and help resolve problems between members.

insurance.question: Are items insured?
insurance.answer: We recommend that owners check their personal insurance. The platform does not provide insurance coverage for borrowed items.

deleteAccount.question: How can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: You can delete your account from your profile settings. Note that this will permanently remove all your data.

privacy.question: How do you protect my privacy?
privacy.answer: We take privacy seriously. We only share information necessary to facilitate loans. Read our privacy policy for more details.

contact.title: Still need help?
contact.description: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues.

contactModal.title: Contact Support
contactModal.subject: Subject
contactModal.success: Your message has been sent. We'll get back to you soon.

footer.description: Share, borrow, and discover amazing items in your community. Building connections through shared resources.
footer.copyright: Library of Things. Built with ❤️ for sharing communities.
